text: A Cinderella Story is a 2004 film. A Cinderella Story or Cinderella Story may also refer to: * A Cinderella Story (film series), an American teen romantic comedy film series, including the first film A Cinderella Story ** A Cinderella Story (soundtrack), soundtrack for the first film ** Another Cinderella Story, 2008 ** A Cinderella Story: Once Upon a Song, 2011 ** A Cinderella Story: If the Shoe Fits, 2016 ** A Cinderella Story: Christmas Wish, 2019 * Ever After: A Cinderella Story, 1998 film * "A Cinderella Story", a 2008 song from Mudvayne off their album The New Game * Cinderella story, a situation where competitors achieve far greater success than would reasonably have been expected
title: A Cinderella Story (disambiguation)
